effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.legends-arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.legends-arceus: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
